**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I am unable to get RAWGraphs to recognize column types. I have formatted the cells to be either number or date. But when I try to create a stacked bar chart, for example, it keeps saying I "Can't map strings to the Y-axis". Even though I am trying to add numbered columns.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
I want to be able to view my data set with the columns "sector", "loan amount", and "date" to different kinds of charts (like line or bar at least).

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
My data only works with the bar chart, but need to see it in many other chart types. I just can't get others to work.

**Additional context**
My data columns are below. What chart styles work with these? Not finding anything other than bar chart.

![chart](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38537084/153334713-1b3b5b22-cf2f-4e09-a146-c2c2d66fb0a5.png)
